documents.document: Got my Multisite Wordpress running easily enough but adding sub domains didn't prove as easy. 3 hours later & it's still not working.

She protested against being put in the lounge to sleep. We acquiesced & she slept on our bed until 6.30am. #Ivyupdate
@Styla73 sorry! Just keep in mind you won't get much sleep which we are learning right now.
She's exhausted #ivyupdate https://t.co/bEd42lPyUJ
She's bouncing around like tigger leaping at flies. They finally provide a use for once; entertainment. #IvyUpdate

He was then wheeled around the office with a sign reading "Kiss me quick I'm getting married!" Many took up the challenge.
Remind me to never get married while I'm at this job. Today my deskmate was gladwrapped to his chair & had his face plastered with makeup..
@_snozzberry_ @Ahhmandah I don't know what to believe anymore.

@torysaurus That's true. I do try to live to a sort of moral code. But it's not dictated by any old book.
